SEARCH
Package uk.trikoz.evgen.springBooks.repository

Interface BookRepository

All Superinterfaces:
org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<Book,Integer>, org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<Book,Integer>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListCrudRepository<Book,Integer>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListPagingAndSortingRepository<Book,Integer>, org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<Book,Integer>, org.springframework.data.repository.query.QueryByExampleExecutor<Book>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<Book,Integer>
@Repository public interface BookRepository extends org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<Book,Integer>
The repository interface for accessing and manipulating Book entities in the database.

  • Method Details

    • readBooks

      @Transactional(readOnly=true) @Query(value="SELECT * FROM books", nativeQuery=true) List<Book> readBooks()
      Retrieves a list of all books in the database.
      Returns:
      A list of books.

    • createBook

      @Modifying @Transactional @Query(value="INSERT INTO `books` (`name`, `author`, `year`, `genre`) VALUES (:#{#book.name}, :#{#book.author}, :#{#book.year}, :#{#book.genre})", nativeQuery=true) void createBook(@Param("book") Book book)
      Inserts a new book into the database.
      Parameters:
      book - The book to be inserted.

    • updateBook

      @Modifying @Transactional @Query(value="UPDATE books SET name = :#{#book.name}, author = :#{#book.author}, year = :#{#book.year}, genre = :#{#book.genre} WHERE id = :#{#book.id}", nativeQuery=true) void updateBook(@Param("book") Book book)
      Updates an existing book in the database.
      Parameters:
      book - The updated book information.

    • deleteBook

      @Modifying @Transactional @Query(value="DELETE FROM books WHERE id = :id", nativeQuery=true) void deleteBook(@Param("id") int id)
      Deletes a book from the database by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the book to be deleted.

    • findBookId

      @Transactional @Query(value="SELECT * FROM books WHERE id = :id", nativeQuery=true) Book findBookId(@Param("id") int id)
      Retrieves a book from the database by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the book to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      The retrieved book, or null if not found.
